title: Yijie He
text:
Hi! I’m Yijie He, currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Management at London Business School with a passion for combining AI/Machine Learning with business. I did my undergraduate studies in Statistics from Fudan University. I have experience in Venture Capital, Equity Research, and corporate settings across various domains such as e-commerce, finance, technology, and real estate.



Fudan University, BSc, statistics | Sept 2019 - June 2023 | Shanghai, China
Harvard College, Exchange, Computer Science | Aug 2022 - Dec 2022 | Boston, United States
London Business School, Msc, Master in Management| Aug 2023 - June 2024 | London, United Kingdom



Source Code Capital | Overseas Investment Analyst | July 2023 - Jan 2024
Xinying Technology | TMT Sector Investment Analyst | Feb 2023 – June 2023
Foresight Fund Management | Equity Research Intern | Feb 2022 – June 2022
Techsharpe Fund | Quantitative Strategy Summer Intern | July 2021 – Sept 2021
